A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt that this latest Star Wars film was one of the weakest in the series. I know this because I fell asleep through parts of it. The plot was not tightly woven. The editing could have been better (way too much time spent on Luke's island). It also lacked the emotional charge of Rogue One and The Force Awakens. \n\nAfter the film was over and the house lights went up\, I was just sort of \"blah.\" A mediocre installment of such a great franchise.
